key_facts: The climate crisis could destroy capitalism.
Günther Thallinger is on the board of Allianz SE.
Allianz SE is one of the world’s biggest insurers.
Insurance may become unavailable for many climate risks.
Without insurance, mortgages and investments become unviable.
Global temperatures may rise between 2.2C and 3.4C.
Extreme weather caused $2tn in damages from 2013 to 2023.
Extreme weather caused $400bn in damages in 2024.
Insurers are ending home coverage in California due to wildfires.
Regions are becoming uninsurable due to climate risks.
Climate-induced risks threaten the entire financial sector.
Entire asset classes are degrading from climate impacts.
Australia’s disaster spending rose sevenfold between 2017 and 2023.
3C of warming would make real estate and long-term investment unviable.
Thallinger urges urgent action to cut or capture emissions.
Thallinger says sustainability goals must equal financial goals.
